[Home](./index.md) &gt; [decentraland-ecs](./decentraland-ecs.md) &gt; [Input](./decentraland-ecs.input.md) &gt; [subscribe](./decentraland-ecs.input.subscribe.md)

## Input.subscribe() method

Subscribes to an input event and triggers the provided callback.

Returns a function that can be called to remove the subscription.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
subscribe(eventName: InputEventKind, buttonId: ActionButton, useRaycast: boolean, fn: (e: LocalActionButtonEvent) => void): () => false | Subscription[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  eventName | <code>InputEventKind</code> | The name of the event (see InputEventKind). |
|  buttonId | <code>ActionButton</code> | The id of the button. |
|  useRaycast | <code>boolean</code> | Enables getting raycast information. |
|  fn | <code>(e: LocalActionButtonEvent) =&gt; void</code> | A callback function to be called when the event is triggered. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`() => false | Subscription[]`
